title: USB charging connected device when no device is connected to USB. How do I turn this off?
content:
Phone is "USB charging connected device" 
although nothing is plugged into USB.

It won't let me switch to controls "on this phone" it is stuck on "on connected device" so I can't turn this off.

I've rebooted the phone, I've turned on developer settings and turned off the USB setting under media in developer settings.

Not really sure what to do. This is absolutely killing my battery
